p: The investigated tree species in this study was P. massoniana. The seeds were collected from the tree Huang 12 located in Duyun City, Guizhou Province, China. The ectomycorrhizal fungus species Suillus luteus (SL) was used for plant inoculation. The fruiting body was collected from the pine forest of Longli Forest Farm, Longli County, Guiyang City, Guizhou Province. The inoculum was prepared, followed by inoculation, according to the methods described by Yu et al. [ 44]. The seedlings inoculated with S. luteus were selected after six months of germination, and the control plants were kept without inoculation of SL.
